introduction: According to statistics, about 8 million people go missing globally each year. Why do people disappear and vanish without a trace? Are they cases of abduction, voluntary disappearance, crime or accidents? "Missing", a brand-new info-ed series, explores this painful social phenomenon. 人，为什么会突然不见，并从此了无踪迹？根据资料显示，地球上每年有8百万人，因为种种原因，从我们身边消失。有的是被诱骗拐带、有的是被强行掳走、有的是离家出走。不见了亲人的家属，心里承受的是什么样的煎熬和痛苦？
